name: King of the Monsters [SG]
description:
ONLY THE MONSTERS WILL SURVIVE
Man is no longer master of the Earth - the are of the Super Monster has arrived. Mankind quakes in fear, as the Monsters do battle to discover who is the strongest Super Monster of all.
Become one of four Super Monsters, and fight to destroy fellow Monsters and human foes alike. Defeat enemies to be crowned the greatest Super Monster of all!
Battle through 8 stages in 4 Battle Cities!
Multiple Monster fighting techniques!
Special deadly weapons for each Monster!
Play against the computer or against another player!
